ygData.subject: Re: does Bard need charisma?
ygData.msgSnippet: Will the song, Cinda`s Charismatic Carillon aid you in getting better prices for selling/buying items?  Even if it just a few copper.  I wonder. And playing
ygData.messageBody:
Will the song, Cinda`s Charismatic Carillon aid you in getting better prices
for selling/buying items? Even if it just a few copper. I wonder.
And playing this in the middle of freeport, its not gonna kill me is it?

Gediprime
Xegony

----- Original Message -----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) <Michael.Garramone@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Saturday, June 26, 1999 10:06 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] does Bard need charisma?


> From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
> yes it is believed higher charisma definitely makes your charms song last
> longer. Dex and Str are melee abilities, Dex allowing you to miss less,
and
> Str allowing you to hit harder (and carry more of course).
>
> Shada Silverleaf, Level 47 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
>
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Dennis Chan [mailto:dchan17@...]
> > Sent: Friday, June 25, 1999 4:52 PM
> > To: eqbards@onelist.com
> > Subject: [eqbards] does Bard need charisma?
> >
> >
> > From: "Dennis Chan" <dchan17@...>
> >
> > can anyone answer that? do we need it for charm song?
> > or do u guys prefer DEX and STR
